Inc.","details":"Ownership is determined by token balance at claim time      This facet is designed for:      - SPVs with LP tokens      - PE/VC funds with membership tokens      - Any entity where ownership = tokenBalance / totalSupply      Waterfall calculations (carry, hurdles, etc.) are computed OFF-CHAIN.      The admin calls createDistribution() with the pre-calculated amount      after waterfall splits have been determined.
